issue_title: [Feature] Add text length validation with configurable max length

changes.description: Added MAX_TEXT_LENGTH constant (1000 chars) and validation in __post_init__, rename(), and from_dict() methods
Added 5 regression tests for text length validation

acceptance_criteria_met: Todo with text > 1000 chars raises ValueError in __post_init__
rename() with text > 1000 chars raises ValueError
from_dict() validates text length and raises clear error
Error message includes actual length and max allowed

risks_and_limitations: Existing todos with text > 1000 chars in storage files will fail to load via from_dict()
This is intentional behavior to enforce data integrity
